headline.print_headline: U.N. Raises Alarm Over Escalating Violence in Darfur
headline.main: U.N. Raises Alarm Over Escalating Violence in Darfur

lead_paragraph: United Nations and African Union officials sounded an alarm on Thursday over the worsening violence in Sudan's western Darfur region, which has led to the displacement of hundreds of thousands of people this year in the remote, conflict-torn territory.
